publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: A treatise of Gods effectual calling: written first in the Latine tongue, by the reuerend and faithfull seruant of Christ, Maister Robert Rollock, preacher of Gods word in Edenburgh. And now faithfully translated for the benefite of the vnlearned, into the English tongue, b Henry Holland, preacher in London
monogr.author: Rollock, Robert

div.head: To the Reader.
div.p: CHristian reader, I pray thee pardon all faults in this first impression: I could not well be present with the workemen for their direction. Some schoole poynts and phrases of schoole men doe not so well relish in the English tongue, nor could be rendred to my content, whatsoeuer is wanting in word or matter in this edition I will amend in the next if the Lord permit: farewell.

closer.signed: Thine in Christ Iesus, Henry Holland.
